    Join us now, see below for details ... ALWAYS READ THIS NFO

    Game Notes:
    ~~~~~~~~~~~

    X-COM:
    Earth's top-secret multinational alien defense force.

    The Place:
    America - Early 21st century.

    The Mission:
    Repel the alien invasion.

    Alien forces have invaded earth and are terrorizing the population. To
    combat this sinister threat, a lone X-com scientist has created the
    Enforcer, a hightech fighting machine made of earthly robotics and 
    scavenged alien technology. Armed with the latest alien hotspots to fight
    in andrenaline-charged battles that rage on city streets, across rooftops,
    and in sewers. You are the Enforcer. Powered by effects, X-Com Enforcer
    puts you on the front line of an alien attack.


    Features:
    ~~~~~~~~~

    - Defeat the alien manace, from the trailer park to the concrete jungle,
      over 35 missions!

    - Experience the power of the Unreal Tournament engine!

    - Do battle with hordes of alien invaders, over 20 alien species!

    - Blast the extraterrestrials with big, bad, over-the-top weapons!

    - Reasearch and upgrade weapons and power-ups to increase your firepower!

    - Play it online with fast-paced cooperative and deathmatch multiplayer!


    Much more Infos and Screenshots at: http://www.xcomenforcer.com

    
    Ripped Data:
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~
  
    CD-Audio and the intro movies, no addon.
